nodes.text: Pearce Naturian was a male doctor who worked in Polis Massa's medical facility and reportedly an old friend of the Jedi Master Yoda. He remained loyal to the Galactic Republic. Several months after Padmé Amidala gave birth to her children, Obi-Wan Kenobi, who was also present at the twins' birth, returned to the facility and met with Naturian to make sure that their secret was safe from the Galactic Empire. He was killed by Inquisitors Malorum and Sancor who were trying to get evidence of Amidala's death for Darth Vader.
